subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Dallas Cowboys receiver Terrell Owens filed a lawsuit that contended his name and photograph were used in nightclub ads without his permission. Owens said the Avalon nightclub on Manhattan’s West Side improperly used his name, likeness and initials in 2006 and 2007 to promote its Friday Night Lights events and other parties. He contended the club claimed he would be the host of the parties.
